features: 【Exceptional Sound Quality】Tiny bluetooth speakers are compact and designed to be extremely sleek and powerful. These mini bluetooth speakers deliver superb audio performance despite their small size, and have long lasting battery life and advanced bluetooth streaming for the best quality audio.

【Fast Bluetooth Connection】:Travel speakers bluetooth wireless use the latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology to connect quickly within 3 seconds, with a maximum connection distance of 30 feet.the in-built microphone allows you to take hands-free calls while listening to music on the go.

【Multi Scene Application】:The small bluetooth speakers portable wireless supports one-touch photography, turn on the phone photo mode and click the button to complete the photo. It’s especially good for outdoor travel and small outings without the fuss of carrying around a bigger speaker.

【Portable Smallest Design】:This mini Bluetooth speaker weighs about 0.74 ounce and has a diameter of 1.4 inches and a height of 1 inches，that they are just the size of an coin; they can easily fit into your pocket or be tied to a key chain for you to take them virtually anywhere.

【Warranty and Customer Support】The LEICEX Small Bluetooth Speaker comes with a one-year warranty for its main components, and our customer support team is available 24 hours to assist you with any post-sales issues or questions that you may have.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LEICEX is an global audio equipment manufacturer headquartered. We already sell mini Bluetooth speakers in 20 countries worldwide. We are committed to providing quality goods to users worldwide. Mini Bluetooth Speakers Specifications Model: Mini Bluetooth SpeakerBluetooth Version: 5.0Size:Ф1.4 x1 inch (Ф35.6 x25.1mm)Color: Black,White,Green,Pink,BlueWeight:0.74 oz (21g)Playing time: 4-5 Hours（50% of Volume） Available in many colors. Compatible with virtually all Bluetooth signal devices. Mini Bluetooth speakers let you take your music on a hike, to the beach, or simply from room to room in your house.

Small Bluetooth Speaker A compact portable speaker is great for those with limited space in their home, backpack or dorm room for an external speaker. Place this speaker next to your pillow before going to bed and enjoy your music. Bluetooth 5.0 The range at which Bluetooth speakers can connect to a device continues to grow along with bluetooth 5.0 upgrade. And the wider the range, the more freedom of movement for you. In general, the range of mini Bluetooth speaker falls somewhere 33 feet. Tiny Bluetooth speaker The LEICEX Bluetooth speaker measures just 1.4 inches in diameter and 1 inches tall, making it the perfect size to slip into a tote bag, backpack, cup holder, or tuck away on a desk or table corner. The passive radiator gives this mini speaker a excellent sound despite its small size.

Stereo Sound Two pieces of this speaker could be connected at once by double clicking On/Off button after Bluetooth speakers are powered on.Then connect again with your Bluetooth device to enable simultaneous playback. You need to do this on both speakers at the same time. They will be connected automatically after this operation. After the first time of this operation, they will be connected automatically without double clicking again. Best Mini Portable Bluetooth Speaker The best mini portable bluetooth speaker is compact and lightweight audio device that allow you to listen to music or other audio content wirelessly from your smartphone, tablet, or any other Bluetooth-enabled device. Package List The built-in microphone function is very convenient if you need to take hassle-free calls. It’s great for a desktop when you want to listen to your digital music and take calls without the need to dig for your phone. You can also accept calls on the go while listening to music. The built-in battery is rechargeable by USB and offers an impressive 4 hours of playback time. The entire package comes with the Mini speaker, USB-C charging cable, Lanyard and User manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed to share music from Apple Watch!
reviews.reviewText: My son only has an Apple Watch, but wanted a way to play music with friends. We synced this to his Apple Watch Bluetooth and this works great! The watch crown controls the volume, and this little speaker can get amazingly loud for its size! This speakers holds a charge well. My favorite part is the size. It’s easy to keep tucked into a pocket or attached to a zipper pull.PSA Tip: it comes with a small lanyard attachment that you need to install. It’s hard to fit into the intended hole. Grab some string or dental floss, thread that through the hole and then pull the lanyard through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This speaker is loud. Not thunderous, but definitely loud.
reviews.reviewText: This little speaker packs a lot for its size. I wear it on my belt loop while I'm working and it lasts 4 to 6 hours, depending on the volume level. It definitely doesn't have much bass to it, but it's the size of a quarter so what can you expect. It's definitely louder than it looks though, I've got lots of comments at work about how loud it is and people asking where I got it. Now two other people at work have the same one. I think I'm going to get some for stocking stuffers too. Great little speaker if you're wanting something that's super portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Edit: While I still stand by my initial review, the company selling this product has been excellent to me about my displeasure. They reached out and made me feel very well treated.The speaker is very small, very light, looks cool, fits in your pocket. Some good things for sure. But it does not sound good. It's staticy/muffled. It is pretty loud though. The audio playing just through my phone is better. If you are looking for a really small speaker to play loud low quality music then it will work. For me, it's just not a quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Speaker ... But
reviews.reviewText: This speaker is very small (fits nicely in my palm) yet indeed has a nice sound. If I did not know better, I would think the price is pretty good for what you get. However, when I purchased two of these speakers, I did not know I could get much better features by purchasing the B11-TF model of this speaker for just $1 more (ugh). This model (the BTS0011) is missing some great features provided by the B11-TF model. Namely, this model, although it can increase the volume, cannot decrease the volume whereas the B11-TF can do both (and the volume control buttons are easy to identify). In addition this model does not have aux input whereas the B11-TF (as implied by its name) has a slot for a TF card. The B11-TF is slightly larger, but still fits nicely in the palm of my hand. I also think the B11-TF has a little better sound. Considering both models have the same brand name, but the better model is only $1 more, I cannot honestly say this model is a good value for the price. If however, you do not care to have a TF slot or the ability to decrease the volume, this model might be a good choice for you (I like saving $1 whenever I can).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your thinking about buying this buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of losing headphones when snowboarding so I decided to look for a speaker for on the mountain I came across this speaker and i decided to buy it and I’m so glad I did. My boyfriend and I used the speaker the whole trip and all we had to do was put it in our jacket pocket. For a tiny speaker it definitely was Loud enough and has a great battery life. Definitely will be repurchasing for my family for next ski trip!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wanted just a tiny speaker to clip to backpack while mountain biking. Wanted something louder than my phone speaker so anyone or anything on trails can hear me coming. This speaker is super small, weighs nothing and add a carabiner and this thing can be brought anywhere without even realizing you have it. Have only run it for upwards of 90 mins or so riding so far so I can’t comment on battery length but I think 2-3 hours is probably max life. Used in light rain with no issue. Charges fast. In terms of speaker, I mean it’s not perfect audio but not terrible, though at full volume the bass can be a bit too much for the small woofer so I tend to keep volume at about 75%. Still plenty louder than phone without losing sound quality. It’s slightly smaller than a golf ball, that’s like the closest thing I can think in terms of shape and size. Would buy again, serves its purpose and if you want a speaker for bike riding would definitely recommend this one cause you’ll notice the sound but not the weight whatsoever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny yet powerful audio
reviews.reviewText: Tiny speaker with a loud audio. It worked for me. Will test out further. Not sure how long the sound lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact speakers for my motorcycle helmet
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a solution to get some headphones into my motorcycle helmet, since the usual solutions for it are uncomfortable (it's more that my helmet doesn't accommodate headphones than issues with the ones on the market). These little speakers mount perfectly in the opening for the face shield on the sides. They're so small that they don't obstruct my view or come in contact with my face. I just affixed them with a little velcro tape, and I faced the speaker parts to the face shield so that they provide better sound and resonance. The audio quality is a little tinny, and there's only a little bass to speak of, but it solved a problem for me that I wouldn't have been otherwise able to fix. I have two of them, because it sounds a little weird listening to just one side, but it allows me to keep it on lower volume, and now if I'm out and want to play some music in an open space, I always have a set of speakers available to me.

Cosa volere di più, funziona benissimo. Si collega via Bluetooth, il suono è pulito e forte. La batteria mi dura almeno 9 h. Poi tutte le sere la ricarico. A questo prezzo non saprei cosa volere di piu

Il prodotto si presenta ben confezionato, è corredato da un laccetto e dal cavo per la ricarica,le dimensioni sono veramente ridotte,il diametro credo sia più o meno quello di una moneta da 2 euro tant'è che io l'ho attaccata alle chiavi come fosse un portachiavi, la durata della ricarica devo dire che va oltre le mie aspettative, ho ascoltato circa 3 ore di musica e non si è ancora scaricata,una volta associata al dispositivo si collega rapidamente ogni volta che viene attivata,unico neo resta il suono,nessun accesso di bassi ,al livello di qualità il suono è paragonabile allo speaker del telefono ma onestamente non sò se con queste dimensioni si può pretendere di più

L'avevo preso visto che le casse del mio Mac Book Pro gracchiano e non ho tempo di peredere 3h per sostituirle. Ma sul Mac Book Pro, nonostante faccia il leasing, dopo pochi secondi si disconnette. Provato anche su un altro Mac e la cosa si è riprosta tale e quale.
Prodotto non ancora consegnato, speriamo non sia pessima come le cuffiette ordinate in precedenza, 3 stelle sulla fiducia
